reviews.name: Alien: Quadrilogy - Alien / Aliens / Alien3 / Alien Resurrection (Blu-ray) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: THIS WAS A GOOD BUNDLE TO GET, THE PRICE WAS ACTUALLY $19.99 BUT LOOKS LIKE THEY UPED THE PRICE SINCE TWO WEEKS AGO WHEN I GOT IT. THEY WAS A GREAT MOVIE PACK, ESPECIALLY FOR THOSE PEEPS THAT HAVE LIKED ALL ALIENS MOVIE. IT WAS GOOD TO HAVE THE ORIGINAL VERSION AND SPECIAL EDITION FOR ALL DISC.
reviews.title: ALIENS (MEMORY LANE)
